name: BaseEvent
description: The foundational class for all events in JSMacros.
overview: BaseEvent serves as the parent class for all JSMacros events, including game events like EventTick, EventSound, EventPlayerJoin, and many others. It provides essential methods for event management that are available across all event types. It works in conjunction with the @Event annotation, which provides metadata about the event.

methods.name: cancellable
methods.description: Determines if the current event can be cancelled. Checks if the event has the @Event(cancellable = true) annotation.

methods.name: joinable
methods.description: Determines if the current event is joinable (can be combined with other events). An event is joinable if it's either cancellable or marked with @Event(joinable = true).

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Attempts to cancel the current event. Throws UnsupportedOperationException if the event is not cancellable.

methods.name: isCanceled
methods.description: Checks if the current event has been cancelled. Useful for checking if another event handler has already cancelled the event.

methods.name: getEventName
methods.description: Returns the name of the event as defined in the @Event annotation. Useful for logging or dynamically handling different event types.

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Manually triggers the event through the current profile. Used to fire custom events or re-trigger existing events.
